title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
quote: You never really understand a person until you consider things from his point of view.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
quote: It is a truth universally acknowledged.

title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
quote: So we beat on, boats against the current.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
quote: When you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.

title: War and Peace
author: Leo Tolstoy
quote: If everyone fought for their own convictions, there would be no war.

title: The Hobbit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
quote: In a hole in the ground there lived a hobbit.
